msg.msgText:
A "Subscription" composite object can be deleted using the "delete" option of the "imaserver" command.
SYNTAX: imaserver delete Subscription help imaserver delete Subscription "SubName=value1" "ClientID=value2" imaserver delete Subscription "SubscriptionName=value1" "ClientID=value2"
EXAMPLE: imaserver delete Subscription "SubName=topicA" "ClientID=client123"
NOTES: 1. "Key=value" pair must be enclosed within double quotation marks. 2. Use the "imaserver stat Subscription" option to get the list of the subscriptions. 3. The parameter "SubscriptionName" is supported for backward compatibility.

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
